event.name: fitness-challenge-jump
event.title: November Fitness Challenge
event.details1: Bench hops (also known as box jumps) are a gym work out exercise perfect to tone legs and lower body muscles
event.details2: This challenge requires you to do as many bench hops as possible in 2 minutes. Prizes to be won if you can show us that you can beat the record! The challenge must be witnessed by ALC

event.name: social-sport-basketball
event.title: Social Sport
event.details1: 3 versus 3 round robin knockout competition (10 minute games)
event.details2: Sign up with your team or join any team by using the sign up sheet located in the recreation room

event.name: fitness-challenge-plank
event.title: December Fitness Challenge
event.details1: Plank is one of the best calorie burning exercises. It engages a group of muscles at once, strengthening your core muscles and giving you an improved posture and flexibility
event.details2: Hold a plank as long as you can, beat the record and prizes to be won! The challenge must be witnessed by ALC

event.name: social-sport-basketball
event.title: Social Sport
event.details1: 3 versus 3 round robin knockout competition (10 minute games)
event.details2: Sign up with your team or join any team by using the sign up sheet located in the recreation room

event.name: portuguese-night
event.title: Portuguese Night
event.description: When you think about Portuguese food, what comes to mind?
event.details1: The Atlantic is the source of Portuguese food, we use a lot of olive oil, spices, poultry and seafood. It is the best, the food is hearty, rich and spicy.
event.details2: If you want to understand the food, come join us at the dining hall, we have prepared a Portuguese feast for you to indulge.
